casebody.data:
No. 09-11092. Calvin Avant, Petitioner v. Los Angeles Central Community Police Station, et al. 562 U.S. 861, 131 S. Ct. 139,

178 L. Ed. 2d 84,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5907, October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Same case below, 352 Fed. Appx. 452.
